thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com | 6 of 12
thread.title: Craig Dickinson

author: Craig Dickinson
title: Craig Dickinson
text: Bought a video recorder. They were out of stock on a couple of the additional items that were in the package but notified me immediately and shipped the two items within a week of the original purchase. (Nothing big, one was a lenses filter and the other a microphone.) They sent tacking on those as well as the original purchase items so I always knew where everything was. I have purchased from Beach before and which is why I purchased from them again. I will definitely buy from them next time.
